tosdr.case: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
quoteText: However, please remember that the Third-Party Services may use, store and disclose your personal information differently, as described in their policies, and Fivestars shall have no liability or responsibility for the privacy practices or other actions of any Third-Party Service.
